amendment.description: To authorize the Secretary of Defense to provide assistance to State National Guards to provide counseling and reintegration services for members of reserve components of the Armed Forces ordered to active duty in support of a contingency operation, members returning from such active duty, veterans of the Armed Forces, and their families.

action.text: Amendment SA 1211 proposed by Senator Levin for Senator Gillibrand.
Point of order that the amendment violates Rule XXII raised in Senate with respect to amendment SA 1211.
Amendment SA 1211 ruled non-germane by the chair.
